name: c64bridge
description: Stdio-based Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that bridges Commodore 64 Ultimate hardware with AI agents.

C64_MODE.description: Select active backend (c64u for Ultimate hardware, vice for emulator)

RAG_EMBEDDINGS_DIR.description: Directory containing RAG embedding JSON files

RAG_REINDEX_INTERVAL_MS.description: Periodic reindex interval in ms (0 disables)

RAG_BUILD_ON_START.description: Set to 1 to rebuild embeddings on server start

RAG_DOC_FILES.description: Comma-separated extra docs to include in RAG

RAG_DISCOVER_FORCE_REFRESH.description: Set to 1 to ignore cached discovery results when fetching external docs

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: Personal access token used for optional RAG discovery against GitHub

C64_TEST_TARGET.description: Overrides integration tests to hit mock or real hardware (mock|real)

VICE_MODE.description: Default video standard for VICE audio capture (ntsc|pal)

VICE_LIMIT_CYCLES.description: Maximum CPU cycles to render when VICE generates audio

VICE_BINARY.description: VICE binary to launch for audio capture

VICE_RUN_TIMEOUT_MS.description: Timeout for headless VICE runs in milliseconds

FORCE_XVFB.description: Set to 1 to force xvfb-run when executing VICE

SIDPLAY_LIMIT_CYCLES.description: Maximum CPU cycles to render when sidplayfp generates audio

SIDPLAY_BINARY.description: sidplayfp binary to launch when generating audio

SIDPLAYFP_BINARY.description: Legacy alias for SIDPLAY_BINARY (sidplayfp executable name)
